name: Ch17ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Ewan;Watch this, Myrrh!|I've been practicing a new spell!
speak;Ewan;Master Saleh taught me this one just last week.|It's supposed to create a small whirlwind.
speak;Myrrh;Oh!|The leaves... they're dancing in the air.
speak;Ewan;Pretty cool, right?|I've been working on controlling the size of the gust.|Watch, I can make it bigger!
speak;Myrrh;It's wonderful, Ewan.|The way you command the wind...
speak;Ewan;Thanks!|I'm going to be as good as my master someday!|Maybe even better, but don't tell him I said that.
speak;Myrrh;Your magic is different from what I've seen before.|It feels... playful.
speak;Ewan;That's because magic should be fun!|At least that's what I think.
speak;Ewan;Say, Myrrh...|Do you know any magic?
speak;Myrrh;I...|I don't know if you could call it magic, exactly...
speak;Ewan;What do you mean?|Can you do something special?
speak;Ewan;Breathe fire?!|That's amazing!|Can you show me? Please?
speak;Myrrh;I'm not sure if I should...|People are often frightened when they see...
speak;Ewan;I won't be scared!|I promise!|Please, Myrrh? I showed you my magic!
speak;Myrrh;...Very well.|But please, step back a little.
speak;Ewan;AMAZING!|That was the coolest thing I've ever seen!|The fire was so bright and colorful!
speak;Ewan;Afraid? Why would I be afraid?|That was incredible!|Can you teach me how to do that?
speak;Myrrh;I'm afraid not...|It's something only my kind can do.
speak;Ewan;Aww, that's too bad.|But still, you're amazing, Myrrh!
speak;Myrrh;Thank you, Ewan.|Most humans are frightened when they see my dragon form.
speak;Ewan;Well, they're just silly then!|I think it's the most impressive magic I've ever seen!|Even better than what Master Saleh can do!
speak;Myrrh;You're very kind.|I'm glad... I'm glad I showed you.
speak;Ewan;We should practice magic together sometime!|You can show me more dragon stuff, and I'll show you more spells!
speak;Myrrh;I would like that very much.|I've never had a friend to practice with before.
speak;Ewan;Well, now you do!|We're friends now, Myrrh!|Dragon-human friendship pact, sealed by fire magic!
speak;Myrrh;Yes...|Friends.|I'm very happy to have met you, Ewan.
speak;Ewan;Me too, Myrrh!|Now come on, let's go find something else to set on fire!
speak;Myrrh;Ewan!|That's not what magic is for!
